identificationModule.briefTitle: The Impact on Recurrence Risk of Adjuvant Transarterial Chemoinfusion (TAI) Versus Adjuvant Transarterial Chemoembolization (TACE) for Patients With Hepatocellular Carcinoma And Portal Vein Tumor Thrombosis (PVTT) After Hepatectomy : A Random, Controlled, Stage III Clinical Trial.
identificationModule.officialTitle: The Impact on Recurrence Risk of Adjuvant Transarterial Chemoinfusion (TAI) Versus Adjuvant Transarterial Chemoembolization (TACE) for Patients With Hepatocellular Carcinoma And Portal Vein Tumor Thrombosis (PVTT) After Hepatectomy : A Random, Controlled, Stage III Clinical Trial.

descriptionModule.briefSummary: To compare the impact on recurrence risk of adjuvant TAI and adjuvant TACE for patients with HCC and PVTT after hepatectomy.
